Review.Contenu: I was grateful for the support of representative Yesid, who patiently investigated my concern. I do feel the Remixer free site creator has some kinks to it, and I hope they will address them, as I would think those are straightforward and to be expected even in a free program.

I had some font display issue with my Wordpress site hosted on Dreamhost, and I contacted their customer services, a few first try did not solve the problem, the good thing is they do follow up, on the 3rd or 4th email attempt to figure out the issue, they got the right person who knows how to solve the issue and resolved it for me. Overall, a good experience.

The guys were great. The only issues I had was that I had two techs, the second if which, his emails got routed to my spam folder. I spent a week waiting for my migration to advance, not knowing someone else was asking me for permissions and confirmation to move forward. It's no ones fault, just a minor inconvenience.

The issue we had has been fixed - Thank you. The only reason we didn't give 5 stars is that some of the questions I asked during the process weren't answered. For example, I still do not know what the issue was and what exactly was done to fix it.

DreamHost created a beautiful website for me. I'm very happy with the final result. The process was smooth for the most part, but there were bumps. I had to make a number of requests over and over again because they weren't addressed during the editing process. However, in the end everything worked out perfectly.

The admin panel is severely lacking and the file manager is suboptimal and every action on admin panel takes atleast 15-20 mins....But the reason I still give it 4 stars is because the support is really good. Pretty responsive and reasonable and they go way beyond to actually help the customer (unlike godaddy who does absolutely nothing). Uptime is pretty good and they have a good tools - free ssl, wp migrator etc.

I had a question about getting an additional user FTP access to my website. I had resolution in less than 24 hours, with detailed instructions.The reasons this was not a 5 star review:- I tried to initiate the conversation with chat, and never got a response even though there was supposed to be someone available to chat with.- The whole system of FTP users and domains has pretty poor user experience. You can get done what you need to get done, but it's just weird. (I say this as a UX professional.)
I appreciated the prompt response and action items to all questions that I asked.

Review.Titre: They provided great support and information!
Review.Contenu: I had an email issue and provided a somewhat vague description of the problem, which I honestly didn't understand and wasn't even sure if DreamHost support could help. Thankfully they understood my gibberish and were able to interpret the error message I was receiving. Their team did a great job of explaining the problem without making me feel stupid and I'm thankful for that!

Review.Titre: DreamHost is pretty cool if you're into saving money and all :)
Review.Contenu: I love DreamHost! Their services, pricing, and customer support is pretty amazing! My only gripe is that they charge to take a customer support phone call. What?! I was pretty shocked, too! You can only reach support through chat and sometimes it feels like typing an essay! Other than that, I'm pleased with just about everything there is to this domain registrar and hosting service and have found to be one of the best!

Review.Titre: I gained my answer by not logging on
Review.Contenu: I gained my answer by not logging on - it was easier. The reason: once logged on, I found myself in a continuous loop with no access to the answer - the problem was well described and the way to the answer looked OK, but after 20 minutes I gave up and logged off and got the answer as an outsider.

first: my site was not up nor could I post. I went to Dream Host and put in order for help. then I noted perhaps I needed to pay for the month so I did and site came back up. That, said the helpers at DreamHost was not the issue but rather than they had troubles at their end.  they got that sorted out and all is well. I was happy with nice response but a bit perplexed because I did not know the trouble was at their end. Then, I know little about such matters since I am 92.
They have good support, except sometimes they take a bit too long to respond. But other than that, is good and their prices are very very good.

The support person at Dreamhost helped me a lot with a recent problem I had with my websites. I was playing around with the Remixer feature and inadvertently disabled my websites. I was kind of panicking, assuming they were gone forever. Support helped me over the multiple days and steps it took to resolve my issue. I don't have a technical background so I needed a lot of help! Thank you, Dreamhost.

We just changed to DreamHost.  My first try at migrating our site did not work due to a problem with our original site.  When the professional services team got involved the site was migrated pretty quickly.

Review.Titre: Technical support from DreamHost is always excellent…
Review.Contenu: Technical support from DreamHost is always excellent. They go above and beyond whatever is needed. The only negative is that sometimes it can take a while to reach the technical support or ProServices. Once you reach them, all your problems get fixed, you get a clear report and good suggestions for future steps. I'm happy .

Communication was good, the team tried different things to improve my site, and in the end, my site performed better.  I'm just not sure it's 100% optimized nor if it was worth the $399 I paid for the service.  Perhaps my expectations were too high...

Helpful!There were a couple of technical things that needed adjusting after the support team's first attempt at restoring my website. Everything I brought up was met with a helpful attitude and ultimately everything got set straight. I'm sure they put in more work than they expected on my project.

Review.Titre: I had a great experience with DreamHost…
Review.Contenu: I had a great experience with DreamHost support staff!  They answered my questions quickly and gave me a lot of useful links to help solve my problem.  Not everyone is an expert on the topic, but I love that many different team members reply to my emails with tips and links to solve the issue.  And in the very few instances where I didn't get the right info, someone else is there to quickly get me to the proper instructions and walk me through it!
Quick response time

Review.Titre: It took a some time and a few team…
Review.Contenu: It took a some time and a few team members but the support team got to the bottom of the tricky performance issues I was having after a server move.Sully and crew deserve 5 stars, but giving 4 because the server automated moves have been pretty bumpy. But overall DreamHost gets it done in all the right ways.

DreamHost assisted me with a hack site repair. They were very professional, patient, and responsive. The system of communication via email only was concerning for me but the technician assigned to me communicated very well in this medium. They got the job done. The only thing that could have made the experience better would be the option to speak to someone live. Just thought maybe things could have moved a little faster in that regard.

I recently contacted customer support related to an error updating the DNS entry. It was not good that they had a problem on their side related to saving DNS updates.However, I contacted support about this issue and they were able to resolve it for me by manually updating the entry within a few minutes. Everything worked as expected.

Review.Titre: Neo A Communicated with me regarding…
Review.Contenu: Neo A Communicated with me regarding the website being down. He made sure the website was back up and running. I have been with Dreamhost since 2018. All of my websites are with Dreamhost. If its a problem they solve it and they send emails to let us know what is going on.

Review.Titre: This team turned my site migration from a nightmare to a dream-come-true!
Review.Contenu: This team came to my rescue by doing a full site migration for me, something that I have tried to do numerous times over the years but found too intimidating. Within a very short time they migrated what they could, advised me what to do so that the images on my blog could be migrated too, and within hours after that they had successfully migrated my entire site. I could not be happier! It was a completely painless process for me and such a pleasure to deal with such friendly professionals. 10/10 highly recommended!

I've requested help from the DH team four or five times over the past two years, and each time they've come back rapidly, with useful and relevant suggestions, and stayed with the problem until it's resolved. Most recently I had an issue with DNS/SSH and Cloudflare which took my website offline, and Lucas was able to help me get it back online - super grateful!

Review.Titre: The Truman Show, Two Thumbs Up, Way Up!
Review.Contenu: Truman was very kind and did an excellent job assisting me with my needs, explained everything clearly and concisely and acted on behalf of the company he represents in stellar fashion. Please give Truman a raise! Thank you:)
the customer service is awesome and super speedy, they could solve my problem super fast which was really great and convinient

Review.Titre: I've been with DreamHost for 20+ years
Review.Contenu: I've been with DreamHost for 20+ years. I love their uniquely useful control panel. I love their support, which is always fast and accurate. I love their fair pricing. I love the flexibility DreamHost provides me. I highly recommend DreamHost, especially if you have multiple domains you need to host.
The few problems that I've had were remedied very quickly by customer support. Otherwise smooth sailing and a good deal.
Great communication and fixed - Thank you Hacked site service! I hope I never have to go to them again - but if I do need it, they will be the ones I go to!

Review.Titre: I used ProServices to repair a hacked…
Review.Contenu: I used ProServices to repair a hacked site.  It was great because I already had a level of comfort with the DreamHost brand for hosting, but the ProServices were more affordable than I anticipated the cost would be.  I have used contract help previously and you do not have that base level of comfortability because they have no brand foundational reputation.  With a contractor/ gig work you take a chance each time you outsource for help.  DreamHost's ProServices expanded my options mentally with this first experience.  I now will think of them top of mind because of the comprehensive solution, professionalism and responsive I received.

Let me count the ways...- SERVICES:  Everything I need, all in one place, at a competitive price.- SUPPORT:  In-house, enthusiastic, expert, and responsive.  Good support is extremely rare in this market and Dreamhost leads by a long way.- SYSTEMS:  Up to date, secure, and well maintained.- UPTIME & SPEED:  It just always works.

Review.Titre: Human Support Assistant Was Most Helpful
Review.Contenu: The human support assistant was most helpful because he zeroed in on my confusion on the terminology used in the billing transactions listed for my domains. As a new user, this was a most reassuring support experience.

Review.Titre: Made the process easy and fast!
Review.Contenu: The website migration team was super responsive, fast, and comprehensive. While we had some confusion and questions on our end, they were able to resolve everything no problem. Very happy with our experience so far and looking forward to our continued experience with DreamHost.

Review.Titre: Great way to get a website going
Review.Contenu: The staff was helpful, encouraging, and just pushy enough to keep the process going when I tended to let it languish. Their requests were systematic and made sense.

Review.Titre: I have had 2 issues that they have…
Review.Contenu: I have had 2 issues that they have actively fix  in the past 7 or 8 months . They do put a lot of effort in educating their customers. Using WordPress/Elementor/ web development as a learning curve that I find challenging .  They did quickly resolve my issues  less than 24 hours ,which I appreciate greatly . In my option, you need a hosting company that can support you as you grow. Dreamhost does this.

Review.Titre: Seemed to quicly solve the issue of my
Review.Contenu: Seemed to quicly solve the issue of my website getting redirected to Russia, but they didn't explain it.

Review.Titre: Help is available even its YOU that causes the problems
Review.Contenu: I have been using DreamHost for longer than I can remember, more than 20 years.  They are super reliable and they quickly fix things that go wrong, though things seldom go wrong.  What made me take the time to do a review is that they were there to help when it was me that caused the problem (well, a Family member).  They got me out of a jam by being able to restore critical data that was accidentally, but intentionally deleted.  The support team responded quickly, and solved my issue.

Dreamhost never disappointed me since i switched to their hosting more than 10 years ago, they have quick and helpful response. Also what impresses me is their continuous improvements on admin panel. Thank you for your great service.

Review.Titre: I've been using Dreamhost services for…hosting my website
Review.Contenu: I've been using Dreamhost services for more than 4 years now. Excellent uptimes, always available to offer help and support and going the extra mile even when something is not covered by my plan.

Review.Titre: I've been with Dreamhost for 19 years…
Review.Contenu: I've been with Dreamhost for 19 years and couldn't be happier. Here's to 19 more!

Anytime I have an issue, the support team is on it within an hour or two, even on the weekend. I’ve got just enough experience building websites to be dangerous, but not enough to really know what I’m doing. Support like this is huge. I just explain the issue, expecting to be given some instructions to muddle through, but most of the time they very kindly just fix it for me. Cannot say enough how wonderful they are.

Review.Titre: I am a beginner person and I am happy…
Review.Contenu: I am a beginner person and I am happy that there is an option like this to have someone help you 24 hours whenever you have a problem and get back to you in less than 24 hours with a solved problem. Professional in their work.

Really great support and their hosting is so affordable. I was sceptical at first but have just migrated my website from a much more expensive host. Migration was easy and seamless with their dedicated WordPress plug in. This is my go to company now for hosting.

Review.Titre: The DreamHost folks are incredibly helpful…
Review.Contenu: The DreamHost folks are incredibly helpful!  I really appreciate their quick response to my many questions and their fixes over the years.  Even a website greenhorn like me can maintain a website!  Thank you for all your help....

Review.Titre: Ported 2 domains and 1 new web site creation.
Review.Contenu: I ported two domains to Dreamhost, email porting went well and we ported 1 web site, which came over and runs much nicer than it used to. We also had Dreamhost's team develop a new 5 page web site to give us a jump start on our new corporation's web site. They were quite professional and completed everything on time right before our old hosting was about to renew. I am quite happy with their services and I will be having my customers who wish us to maintain their Web and email port over to Dreamhost, which tells you just how satisfied I really am.
I contacted Dreamhost by Chat and my issue was dealt with promptly and effectively, and the operator was very patient and kind. It made me feel confident to reach out again if I should need to.

Review.Titre: Excellent site host for my blog
Review.Contenu: Excellent site host for my blog. Everything works smoothly, and when there are questions or know-how things I need help with, support is quick, personal, and super-helpful. And all at a price that is most reasonable. Highly recommend.

Review.Titre: Sometimes there is a little wait but…
Review.Contenu: Sometimes there is a little wait but the techs always fix the issue and are courteous.

My first contact was with Sergio to talk about my website needs and costs. He scheduled the meeting quickly and then connected me with the Pro team Abhay who made the necessary changes to my site. It was an easy process. Thank you

I've been hosting my websites with Dreamhost for several years now. I have ZERO skills in website development and frequently contact them for assistance. I'm always so impressed (and relieved!) at the level of professionalism, helpfulness, and friendliness I encounter with all of their folks! I've never had a single bad (or even neutral) interaction with them and they always get my website(s) to where I'm trying to go! Can't speak highly enough of their dreampress services in particular!

Review.Titre: I've been really happy with Dreamhost
Review.Contenu: I've been really happy with Dreamhost.  We've been with them for probably a decade or more.  The VPS server runs great - fast, dependable.  The people at Dreamhost are excellent - very knowledgeable... not condescending.  They're helpful.  I don't think I've had a bad experience yet with support whenever I've wanted to chat/talk with them.  Great hosting company - I would definitely recommend them to others without hesitation.-Todd
Fantastic customer service. Luis V. answered very quickly and explained everything so well. He is a credit to Dreamhost. Thanks again Luis!

I've been with Dreamhost for more than 10 years, whenever I have an issue (which is rare), their customer support has always been responsive and helpful. Tonight I had a random email server issue and the customer service rep went into my account and made the necessary changes to my settings so that all is well. I would share my apple pie with them. Even if it was the last slice.

Review.Titre: Solution to disappearance of header and primary menus
Review.Contenu: I am really feeling good with DreamHost. It deserves more than 5 stars. My website header and menus suddenly disappeared during the customization and kept me restless. As I contacted this amazing DreamHost team, they equally did not rest. They were all awake promptly responding to all my emails, guiding me on what to do until the problem was solved. Many thanks to you all.

There are plenty of cheap hosting companies out there offering really good functional hosting.Where Dreamhost make a difference is in customer support. When things go wrong, they are there to help. Responsive, polite, helpful. Awesome.
Everyrthing worked great and smooth. Help desk very proffesional and very kind.

I really appreciate the deep tech support. There are so many variables when trouble-shooting a Wordpress website. DreamHost technicians really spent some time helping me figure out a very obscure problem.

Had an issue come up after they migrated some databases to a new server. They assigned someone to my support ticket and took care of the issue for us. They have helpful online instructional guides, and support is usually very responsive.
Excellent web hosting company! Their customer support gets 6 out of 5 stars because they're always prompt and helpful with my questions.

Review.Titre: Happy to be a DreamHost customer :)
Review.Contenu: Researched my options before hooking up with new hosting platform, and I liked that this one specialized with Wordpress (my fav web platform). They answered all of my questions before migrating a B2B website from another hosting, all went smooth as butter, no hiccups!I love the quick response time from this support and their "nailed it" replies, always on point, very quick and efficient, I missed this kind of support for a while now :)Happy to be here!

Pro Team members were fast, very pleasant, and clear in their communications.They resolved my problem more quickly than initially promised, answered all the questions, and offered solutions going forward.
With the Dreamhost support I was able to successfully move my web page from a previous host that was closing down.
Super helpful with web glitches. Makes being a moderately competent website builder possible without having to hire expensive help for my hobby and personal pages. 10/10 never changing hosts.

Review.Titre: Monica was so great to work with
Review.Contenu: Monica was so great to work with.  Always willing to make our website better.  Very responsive.  Together we created a wonderful website. Thank you Monica!  We couldn't have done it without out.

Monika (and her team) was truly a dream to work with. Our site wasn’t easy, but they were so proficient and professional and got our company website exactly like we needed and wanted it to be.Each time we had issues, Monika and her team were able to fix the problems.I am so appreciative to Monika for her skill and patience while making our site wonderful.  I have nothing but praise! Thank you!

Email Issues Resolved Pronto!Had an issue with my emails not sending to other internal company emails. Sent a support request through and the issue was resolved within an hour. Very happy with my experience!
Outstanding Service! I can always count on DreamHost to be there when I’ve needed them to be. I really appreciate it!
Absolutely great and professional support! Thanks to all the team at dreamhost!

I have hosted my websites with DreamHost for nearly a year and am very happy with the performance, but am especially happy with the Customer Service Team. I had issues with my website optimization and the team took the time to provide detailed instructions which ultimately helped me to solve the issue.

I moved a domain/website from a combination of hosting services and needed some help with some slightly esoteric MX setup and getting past my inability to see semi-obvious controls.On-line chat and email agents helped to do what I needed to do very quickly.

Specifically Dreamhost’s chat team has resolved every single issue we have had. I have recommended Dreamhost just because of their high level of expertise and their willingness to help and even recommend ways to improve our website.

Review.Titre: I was totally hosed, Cherry to the rescue!
Review.Contenu: I was totally hosed. My fault. I accidentally deleted most of the files in my Wordpress directory. And all of the fancy backup tools I paid for years completely failed e.g., Jetpack and Vault Press. Worthless!I'm totally hosed right? Well after running into a number of issues trying to restore through the tools, Cherry E. came in for the rescue. She was able to manually restore everything, provided clear instructions, made a backup of existing files, and generally saved the day. Thank you Cherry E!

Review.Titre: Trust in dreamhost. The best hosting service.
Review.Contenu: To register a domain takes only a few minutes and you have it. Jut set the hosting and install the WP and you have everything running in less than 15 minutes. If you need support is right there all the time and the best part if you are not a pro they will understand you and they will make you to understand what’s wrong. In some words this is the fourth year i am with Dreamhost and i just wish that they keep up the good work and prices like always. Thank you Dreamhost

Review.Titre: Help is always so fast and efficient
Review.Contenu: Help is always so fast and efficient at Dreamhost; literally minutes, if that.I had an issue with an expired SL certificate, and it is due to an outside service but Camilo at Dreamhost was able to help me correct the issue and answer my questions regarding avoiding this in the future. Thanks!

Review.Titre: Jewel helped me put getting my site…
Review.Contenu: Jewel helped me out getting my site back up and running after I broke it lol. It was nice to actually have support.
Customer Service is always amazing! They always answer my questions, and because I am a novice website creator, they speak to me as such! And in most cases, they even take the reins when needed.

Review.Titre: Exceptional customer service that goes above and beyond
Review.Contenu: I contacted DreamHost with a slightly knotty query. I wanted to recover content for a site that I had foolishly allowed to lapse and it was nicked! JD E at DreamHost was sympathetic and very knowledgeable as he walked me through how I could do so. Exceptional customer service that goes above and beyond! I will be renewing with them for another year!

I've had my WordPress site on Dreamhost for years, and have had excellent reliability. When I messed up late on a Friday night (because I don't understand PHP at all) and created a critical error that took down my site, Neo at customer service responded quickly, fixed my site, and got it back running immediately with a really friendly response.

UK Wordpress user here. The Pro Dreamhost team helped with a technical problem recently and their service was efficient, professional and polite. Really happy with their approach, and the results. Would definitely use them again without hesitation.

Super helpful and quick to the point! DreamHost support is always super knowledgeable and quick to the point. There is almost never a wait to talk to anyone. Clearly, there are exceptions but it's rare. I've had a ton of issues with my websites because I don't know what I'm doing so they're always on top of it when I contact them. My experience on the 12th, I couldn't connect with a database and it was my own ignorance about the name servers on Google Domains. So, not DreamHost's problem but guess what? Joshua A. walked me through how to quickly fix it and it was resolved in less than 5 minutes. My prior hosts GoDaddy and HostGator were awful, with awful support that was sometimes outsourced. They'd never help me like DreamHost has. I would highly recommend DreamHost for any service simply based off of their product and support.

Review.Titre: The project manager was very responsive…
Review.Contenu: The project manager was very responsive to my queries and website build requests. I received the website I had envisioned in my mind.

I had a great experience with Luis helping me in support at Dreamhost! He did even more than I expected from my service ticket. I have been with DreamHost for about 6 years now and they have great support and help!Olivier

Review.Titre: The Dreamhost Pro Services team was great!
Review.Contenu: The Dreamhost Pro Services team was absolutely great. They are a group of professionals who work promptly and professionally. They were of huge help to me. Without Abhay and his colleagues I would never have managed to get the hacked site back on track.A big big thank you also for  your kindness

Very professionally handled. This was a simple, small site migration, but the DreamHost team hit the mark 99.7% on the first try.My only quibble is not with DreamHost. I hate Zoom and Zoom-like platforms. I have some hearing issues, and the audio clipping on real-time A/V platforms gives me fits. Good kudos to DreamHost though, they were patient enough to repeat themselves until I got all of what they said.

Review.Titre: Dreamhost are always there for me
Review.Contenu: Dreamhost are always there for me, and are quick to assist with technical guidance I can understand and do myself. Staff are knowledgable, respectfull and friendly. I've been with them since 1999 and there have been hiccups, but there are hiccups everywhere. Never want another host.

Solid, reliable hosting for me since 2009.  Consistently quick and on-point support whenever I need it (which is happily pretty rare), and given by competent individuals who know their stuff and are able to help.Nearly 15 years in, I am a happy customer!

I am delighted to share my outstanding experience with DreamHost, a web hosting provider that truly exceeded my expectations. After using their services for several months, I can confidently award them a five-star rating.From the moment I signed up, DreamHost impressed me with their user-friendly interface and seamless onboarding process. Setting up my website was a breeze, thanks to their intuitive control panel and comprehensive documentation. I appreciate how DreamHost caters to users of all technical backgrounds, making it accessible for both beginners and experienced webmasters.DreamHost's uptime has been nothing short of exceptional. I have not experienced any significant downtime during my tenure, ensuring that my website remains accessible to visitors around the clock. This reliability has had a positive impact on my online presence and user experience, and I am grateful for the stability provided by DreamHost.One aspect that sets DreamHost apart is their commitment to fast loading speeds. My website's pages load swiftly, even with media-rich content, which has undoubtedly contributed to a positive user experience. Additionally, DreamHost's use of solid-state drives (SSDs) ensures quick data retrieval, further enhancing the overall performance of my website.Another standout feature of DreamHost is their unwavering focus on security. With robust firewalls, malware scanning, and automatic updates, I feel confident that my website and visitors' data are well protected. The peace of mind I have gained from DreamHost's security measures is invaluable.DreamHost's customer support deserves special praise. Whenever I had a question or encountered an issue, their support team was readily available to assist me. Their knowledge, professionalism, and swift response times have left a lasting impression on me. Whether through live chat, email, or their extensive knowledge base, DreamHost's support team has always provided me with reliable solutions.Lastly, DreamHost's pricing structure is transparent and fair. They offer competitive rates without compromising on quality, and their flexible plans cater to different needs. I appreciate the absence of hidden fees or upselling tactics, which further enhances the trust and satisfaction I have as a customer.In conclusion, DreamHost has proven to be an exceptional web hosting provider. With their user-friendly interface, impressive uptime, fast loading speeds, top-notch security measures, reliable customer support, and transparent pricing, they have exceeded my expectations in every aspect. I wholeheartedly recommend DreamHost to anyone in search of a reliable and feature-rich hosting solution.

I have had to contact DreamHost Support folks on multiple occasions over the past few weeks while resurrecting several long-neglected websites and wikis. Every support agent I interacted with was responsive and helpful. If a particular agent was unable to provide a working solution, he/she/they were able to pass my issue to someone who could resolve it. The DreamHost support crew totally rocks!
Very easy, fast and most important personal contact without any trouble. Absolutely worth the money.

Review.Titre: I recently had the pleasure of immediate and querry response
Review.Contenu: I recently had the pleasure of interacting with the customer support team, and I must say that I am thoroughly impressed with the level of service I received. My queries were addressed immediately, showcasing a remarkable commitment to prompt and efficient assistance.Overall, my experience with the customer support team was exceptional, and I commend them for their excellent service. I feel confident and reassured knowing that I can rely on such a responsive team whenever assistance is needed. Keep up the fantastic work!

Review.Titre: The support team worked to make sure my…
Review.Contenu: The support team worked to make sure my website was updated and went back in to figure it out when something went wrong, without me having to do anything! I appreciate that they sent me emails to let me know what was happening and that they were willing to help so much. Love dreamhost!

Review.Titre: Made the move to Dreamhost and glad I did
Review.Contenu: I am not the review writing type, but I was a LONG time Yahoo Small Business customer and very loyal.  They moved a few times and this last time it was horrible.  I did not know what to do so I finally decided to move services and was very leery to do so.  Read good things about Dreamhost services and support plus the price was excellent.  After the transfer of web hosting and domain hosting, updating my sites, and contacting customer/tech support a few times I can 100% say I am impressed AND very glad I moved to Dreamhost.  I am VERY happy with their services and highly recommend.
DreamHost offers prompt and helpful support and always lets me know about upgrades.

Review.Titre: Dreamhost customer service is top notch!
Review.Contenu: Dreamhost is a solid hosting provider, but what keeps me with them is customer service. They're there and responsive when I need them. And that's huge.

Used DreamHost Professional Services to build a "quick site" website for me. Well worth the $499. I struggled through 3 versions of my website, couldn't get it to look how I wanted, plus it was very slow loading and user experience was poor. They re-did it with a similar look and feel but WAY better, cleaner, faster, with small features that I would never figure out. Really good communication the whole time. I was able to provide input up front (you fill out questions and select templates) and then we iterated a bit during the process. It was very easy to work with the team and I'm thrilled with the results. For someone who is not a website person, this service was a steal for $499. It saved me DAYS of ineffective work, so I could work on things I should be doing for my business. Highly recommend!!

Review.Titre: When they remove a feature, they will change the option for you.
Review.Contenu: Had an issue with a feature that was removed from the panel and the tech was able to fix it for me.

Review.Titre: I purchased a domain but it was still…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a domain but it was still linked to the previous owner's website.  The support tech quickly disconnected the link then went above and beyond to link it to my other existing website.  Well done!

Review.Titre: My issue was fixed and I appreciate the…
Review.Contenu: My issue was fixed and I appreciate the great customer service. I love the opportunity to grow your website with confidence that you will be supported.

Review.Titre: Very professional and fast to fix the…
Review.Contenu: Very professional and fast to fix the issues unlike the many other hosts I had in the past

DreamHost has hosted my small business website since 2015. They are not only dependable and affordable, but when my site crashed last night the support team quickly responded to my support tickets and brought it back up promptly and cheerfully. 10 out of 10 recommend!

I haven't shopped around for website hosting costs in several years but the support from the Dreamhost staff is great. Any time I've ever had questions or site issues they'll been great at guiding me to the solution I needed.

Absolutely the star on the sky of hosting companys. Never saw a so extreme competence and fast response support like in that company. Just perfect! Im realy satisfied and happy and im not payed for write this.! jörg from switzerland

Review.Titre: Support staff are helpful and patient
Review.Contenu: I can always rely on the support staff responding in a timely and efficient manner. I'm no expert and code makes my eyes glaze over so I really appreciate the patience they have is resolving what are usually simple things that I don't have the skills to deal with.

Review.Titre: I have been with DreamHost for over 5…
Review.Contenu: I have been with DreamHost for over 5 years and I have 5 active websites with them. Their customer service has been amazing and the rates for services are outstanding. I highly recommend them for all of your website hosting needs.
Great support staff and quick answers. I don't usually have a problem with Dreamhost, but when I do it gets resolved quickly. They even help when it isn't their problem, but mine.

I was migrating my site from an existing host to DreamHost, with nearly 80 GB of data, and multiple databases, and a lot of things that would need to be reconnected. DreamHost was very quick to get everything moved over, and working seamlessly. I am very happy with the service.

Review.Titre: DreamHost Pro Services: Exceptional Professionalism and Expertise
Review.Contenu: I had an excellent experience with DreamHost, particularly with their DreamHost Pro Services Web Design team. Nusrat, in particular, stood out for their exceptional professionalism and assistance throughout the process.The DreamHost Pro Services team demonstrated a high level of expertise, providing professional and insightful guidance during the redesign of my website. Nusrat's support was invaluable, as they were not only knowledgeable but also exceptionally helpful.The redesign process was smooth and efficient, thanks to the team's proficiency. They were attentive to my needs, ensuring that the final result met my expectations. The level of professionalism displayed by Nusrat and the DreamHost team was truly commendable.

The communication with the service team as we navigated the repair process for the hacking of our site, was great. They were responsive and clear in their advice and instruction. Though it took longer than expected to get things back to normal, they hung in there with us.
DreamHost customer support is second to none. They go above and beyond to help solve problems and even made my life easier by setting up a redirect for me.

Review.Titre: DreamHost helped me close my website when I retired
Review.Contenu: I ran a successful engineering consulting company for 10 years when I became semi-retired.  Today's experience is what I would expect from a user-responsive company.  I am now fully retiring and DreamHost made it easy to remove my website from the internet.  I highly recommend using DreamHost to all future consultants and other business.

Dreamhost’s client service is excellent, the team is reactive and patient with all of our demands regardless of the number of questions we have. The interface is ergonomic and intuitive which makes Dreamhost easy to use ☺️
